Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Good choice, but in case you missed it,
we also carry <clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff> now.
Com_Talk_02c:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Appreciate the business! <sp:5:0:0>I'll buy whatever
else you're selling too, while we're here.
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome! I can see you're a customer
with some taste!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>OK! Here are your rupees. <sp:5:0:0>May as well
ask if there's anything else you're looking
to get rid of.
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Am I right that this your first time in
our shop?
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Very generous of you to clean out my
stock! I better put in an order for more.
Talk_0039:
That's right! I'm proud to be <clr:0000>the only
merchant<clr:ffff> who sells <clr:0000><clr:ffff>monster extract!<sp:0:4:0>My main business used to be useful
things you can attach to arrows for a
little-extra oomph.<sp:0:4:0>But a contact of mine helped me source
<clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>, and now I have a sideline
in that too!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If anything catches your eye, bring it here
and let me know so we can close the deal.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>Welcome to Fyson's general store!
Whatever you need, when you come to
us, it's son and done!
Com_Talk_05b: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0101><clr:ffff>I'll buy any goods you don't need!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>So sorry, but I don't have enough stock
to put anything up for sale.<sp:0:4:0>But if you're just here to sell, I can
accommodate you there, no problem!
Com_Talk_05c:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0101><clr:ffff>Can't wait to see what you're selling me
this time.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Wait a second. You don't have enough
rupees to cover that.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>The sun may have set, but the 'son never
sleeps! Welcome to Fyson's general store!
Com_Talk_05d:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0101><clr:ffff>Take all the time you need,
loyal customer.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ah, looks like your bag's full though.
If you have stuff you don't need, we can
work something out.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>It might be raining outside, but it's
son-ny in here! Welcome to Fyson's
general store!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry! <sp:5:1:0>I know I said I'd buy anything.
But I meant anything except that.
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>So sorry, but I don't have enough stock
to put anything up for sale.<sp:0:4:0>But if you're just here to sell, I can
accommodate you there, no problem!
Remember, "Son and done!"
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>OK, no one's gonna buy stuff you're still
wearing. Take it off first and we can do
business then!
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We offer all kinds of useful materials you
can attach to arrows, plus <clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>
to spice up your cooking.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>Wow, I'm sold clean out of stock. I'll have
more for you next time!
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for your business! Is that all
you're selling though?
Com_Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you ever find yourself carrying around
more junk than you want, I'll buy it off
you, no questions asked!
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're interested, I can hook you up!
Son and done!
Com_Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's what you're in the market for, huh?
How many you want?
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Did you come because you heard we
started carrying <clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>That's right! I'm proud to be <clr:0000>the only
merchant<clr:ffff> who sells <clr:0000><clr:ffff>monster extract!<sp:0:4:0>My main business used to be useful
things you can attach to arrows for a
little-extra oomph.<sp:0:4:0>But a contact of mine helped me source
<clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>, and now I have a sideline
in that too!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're interested, I can hook you up!
Son and done!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>Welcome to Fyson's general store,
where we open for business each day
at the crack of son!
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>We welcome repeat customers as well
as repeat conversationalists!<sp:0:4:0>If you're looking for things to attach to
your arrows for a little more "zip," you
won't find better than what we offer.<sp:0:4:0>Our selection is second to son!
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you stick things together that you didn't
mean to, try talking to Pelison over there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>He'll have them separated in a jiffy
and <clr:0000>return them to you<clr:ffff>, no sweat.
Son and done!
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I'm so glad something caught your eye!<sp:5:0:0>
We have more to offer, so don't be shyâ€”
just buy, buy, buy!
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Great! Thanks for the business. Don't
forget you can stick things together!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Be careful not to leave any
merchandise behind!
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Whatever you need!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Welcome to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff> operated by
Hudson Construction! You'll know us by
our motto, "son and done!"
Com_Talk_02b: <sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll take it! <sp:5:0:0>Got anything else to sell?
